title: The Decent Humanoids Wiki
overview: Welcome to the Decent Humanoids Wiki. Let's get started
imageDescription: Baelok, Anak, DM, Maeve, Xalys, Viz
rightInfo1: here is some cool info in the right float
title3: Stick Em With the Pointy End
Section1: Why not start by looking up one of our main cast members?
Section2: They say a man with many hats is very fashionable. This is true. I am fashionable. Look up one of the many NPC's played by me, the Dungeon Master.
Section3: Here you'll find entries about the cool items the group used.

title: Maeve Leaflock
overview: The stealthy by choice, firecracker by nature, Rogue of the Decent Humanoids
rightInfo1: Maeve checking if the coast is clear before continuing her stealth mission
Section1: Maeve wasn't always level 13, but she was always a badd ass bitcchh.
Section2: Maeve now resides in the reconstructed Dunshire with her family. She enjoys sparring with Trove when Trove is in town, and playing with her brother Jax.

title: Dagger of Many Daggers
overview: This thing is one dagger, but then sometimes many daggers
rightInfo1: The dagger is a well made physical +1 weapon. The dagger feels well balanced for throwing, and if during an attack the power word is spoken many ethereal daggers fly with it.
rightInfo3: +1 Magical Dagger - Two charges per day
rightInfo5: If power word is spoken, roll 2d4, and gain that many extra attacks.
title1: Why carry many blade when one do trick?
Section1: The first time this dagger is used is always an interesting experience for the user. They swear they only threw one, but those seven daggers they threw were not imaginary. When confronted on how they managed to stab someone eight times, they often reply that they only stabbed them twice. When it was pointed out that they actually threw five, yet there was only one dagger in the dummy, it left everyone scratching their heads.
